PrivilegedProdigy5.desc: NAME was recognized as gifted early in his glitterworld upbringing. Luckily, HIS family was in a position to cultivate that genius through advanced education. HIS training included science, leadership, and the arts.

PlanetaryDiplomat42.title: Planetary diplomat
PlanetaryDiplomat42.desc: NAME's passion and profession was interplanetary politics. HE was a master of social manipulation and negotiation and devoted HIMself to working towards peace, compromise and mutual benefit.

ChildProdigy22.title: Criatura prodigi
ChildProdigy22.desc: Després de graduar-se a la universitat amb dotze anys. NAME va dedicar la seva vida a la recerca de la immortalitat. La recerca va creuar una línia vermella quan va provar de modificar el seu cos amb teràpies genètiques i millores mecàniques. Va ser condemnat a un planeta presó.

RenegadeEngineer33.title: Enginyer renegat
RenegadeEngineer33.desc:
Després d’escapar del planeta presó amb un grup de presoners, va posar destí al seu planeta natal.
Allà va reclutar alguns seguidors més, va robar un creuer espacial i va fugir.

BoneCollector51.title: Bone collector
BoneCollector51.desc:
Born to a family of fortune hunters, NAME always had a passion for ancient history.
Though never a tough or social boy, HE loved to dig through history books as well as dirt piles.

Osteologist68.title: Osteologist
Osteologist68.desc:
After graduating university at the top of his class, NAME quickly became a well-known and athletic college professor.
With his new found fame and fitness came a sudden reluctance to preform menial labor - such tasks are better left to graduate students.

GNomeSculptor81.title: Escultura G-noma
GNomeSculptor81.desc:
NAME és el resultat del disseny d’un laboratori dins el projecte G-noma. Quan va néixer li van implantar el conéixement encilopèdic de tots els aspectes de la xenobiologia.
Els científics li va posar el sobrenom de «Guizmo» i el van posar a fer escultures. Va desenvolupar una gran passió per esculpir gnoms i accessoris per gnoms.

Gnomebiologist56.title: Biologia de gnoms
Gnomebiologist56.desc:
NAME es va fer professor de xonobiologia en una universitat d’un mobrillant. Feia conferències i gestionava una galeria d’arty.
Tan mateix, no va parar mai de fer nans de jardí, i ho considerava la seva autèntica professió.

CircusPerformer69.title: Circus performer
CircusPerformer69.desc:
Growing up in the circus, NAME learned a lot of interesting things. More interesting then the balls he juggled were the pockets he picked between shows.
A mistake with some firesticks made him develop a deathly fear of fire.

CriminalKingpin63.title: Criminal kingpin
CriminalKingpin63.desc:
NAME discovered his gift - people did what he said, when he said it. Taking advantage of this, he set off for the rimworlds planets to make a name for himself in the criminal underworld.
Having people do things for him taught him to avoid manual labor at all costs.

VatgrownSlavegirl4.title: Vatgrown slavegirl
VatgrownSlavegirl4.desc: Emmie was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, she was taught only to cook, clean and serve her masters. For most of her childhood, she knew nothing else.

UrbworldSexSlave3.title: Urbworld sex slave
UrbworldSexSlave3.desc: Emmie was sold into sexual slavery. Having been designed to be inhumanly attractive and too weak to rebel against her masters, she was passed between dozens of owners and knew nothing of freedom.

GunKid57.title: Gun kid
GunKid57.desc:
Growing up in a urbworld, NAME never had it easy. Every day was a struggle and pollution, hunger, and gangs of older kids.
In the little space he had to himself, he studied his passion - guns, combat tactics, and war history.

UrbworldSergeant87.title: Urbworld sergeant
UrbworldSergeant87.desc:
NAME's passion for all things militaristic kept with him all the way to adulthood.
After enrolling as a local policeman, he was soon promoted to sergeant.

FeudalLordling43.title: Feudal lordling
FeudalLordling43.desc:
NAME grew up on a feudal world that was part of a multi-planet empire. As the son of a high lord, HE enjoyed many privileges.
HECAP learned to maneuver in the both the political landscape and in close quarters combat.

SystemLord49.title: System lord
SystemLord49.desc: For NAME, ruling a country, or even a planet, was not good enough. HECAP sought to expand his influence across the system - by legal or extralegal means.

FeudalFarmBoy31.title: Feudal farm boy
FeudalFarmBoy31.desc:
NAME was the son of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in his footsteps. He was brought up as a kind, well trained farm boy.
He lived in an unusual feudal kingdom which co-existed with a midworld society which was itself well-known for genetic manipulation.

HunterOfTheKing3.title: Hunter of the king
HunterOfTheKing3.desc:
NAME was forced to protect his colony in the name of the king after a mysterious outbreak of murderous genetically-modified wildlife.
Despite his best efforts, his kingdom was destroyed. NAME developed PTSD, a hatred of animals and a bad case of technophobia. HECAP was named for the place they found him.

SpaceFanboy24.title: Apassionat de l’espai
SpaceFanboy24.desc: NAME somiava a viatjar per l’espai. Va construir la seva propia nau espacial de cartró per poder descobrir l’espai desconegut.

Castaway19.title: Castaway
Castaway19.desc: NAME was a passenger on a routine interstellar transit. When his ship was destroyed, he lived as a castaway on an uninhabited planet for several years.

GlitterworldNerd52.title: Friki de monbrillant
GlitterworldNerd52.desc:
A NAME li va encantar la tecnologia des del dia que va néixer. Tenia un company mecanòide que va provar de modificar que tenia 10 anys.
La seva obsessió per la tecnologia va fer que no pogués apreciar mai l’art i la cultura.

EnergyResearcher46.title: Investigació d’energia
EnergyResearcher46.desc: NAME treballava en la idea de poder millorar la velocitat de comunicació a llargues distàncies. Va cometre un error que va destruir el seu laboratori i bona part de la ciutat. Va fugir del planeta per escapar de les autoritats.

WarChild73.title: War child
WarChild73.desc: Mushinto's parents were drafted into a civil war in his home country. Growing up surrounded by fighting and death, he became well-accustomed to tragedy and tough as nails. His expressive side, however, never developed.

BountyHunter22.title: Bounty hunter
BountyHunter22.desc: When the civil war ended, Mushinto had to find a new way to use his fighting skills. He decided to hunt down war criminals and soon realized that he enjoyed capturing bad guys by any means necessary.

UpperUrbworlder20.title: Upper urbworlder
UpperUrbworlder20.desc: NAME had a privileged childhood on a major urbworld. Living in an apartment far above the dense poverty of the city, HE spent most of HIS time reading or drawing the cityscape he saw through HIS window.

Missionary23.title: Missionary
Missionary23.desc: NAME decided to devote HIS life to religious service. HE made a vow of peace and spent several years preaching and serving food in soup kitchens for the homeless.

IdealisticCadet35.title: Cadet idealista
IdealisticCadet35.desc:
NAME va educar-se dins la tradició militar dels seus avantpassats, li van ensenyar que havia de liderar i emular les gestes dels herois de la família Dichtery.
Va destacar en els estudis i es va graduar amb honors.

MercenaryPilot69.title: Pilot mercenari
MercenaryPilot69.desc:
NAME va convèncer el seu esquadró de fugar-se amb les naus i posar rumb als planetes limítrofes per poder lluitar pes les causes en que creien.
Els seus homes eren valents i lluitaven dur, però els ideals es van anar esvaint per passar a defensar la causa de qui pagava millor.

ChildOfGlass96.title: Child of glass
ChildOfGlass96.desc:
NAME was raised underground on a "marble" planet - a wasteland of radioactive asphalt and toxic fallout.
To survive on a planet devoid of life, HE had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

LoneTraveler73.title: Lone traveler
LoneTraveler73.desc:
After escaping HIS homeworld on a jury-rigged ship, NAME traveled to new worlds to experience their beauty.
HECAP joined resistance groups and applied the skills HE cultivated on HIS homeworld. HECAP often warned of the nuclear horror HE saw as a child.

AmateurBotanist14.title: Amateur botanist
AmateurBotanist14.desc: Spending many summers crawling through dirt, Christian found he had quite the green thumb. Instead of learning to cook the food he grew, he just grew more and more.

Undertaker50.title: Undertaker
Undertaker50.desc: NAME roamed the galaxy offering grief assistance to those who've had a recent loss. While he never shied away from physical confrontation, he prefers to confront tough situations with a calm word.

ChildSlave6.title: Child slave
ChildSlave6.desc: Graham was born to a poor family on a rimworld. His father sold him into slavery at a young age and he was traded many times. A tycoon bought him as part of a child labor force and sent down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

Mercenary75.title: Mercenary
Mercenary75.desc: After escaping a crew of rimworld slavers, Graham developed a lack of respect for life. He proceeded to sign on to a mercenary group where he developed skills using guns and survival techniques. Graham did dirty work where he found it, and traveled to many worlds.

AdventuringChild56.title: Criatura aventurera
AdventuringChild56.desc:
NAME va rebre l’educació necessària per ser treballar en una enginyeria. Durant molt temps va planejar viatjar de polissó en un vaixell de càrrega i començar una fabulosa vida d’aventures.
Una nit va esperar que els seus pares s’adormissin i va aconseguir colar-se en un vaixell de càrrega just abans que salpés del port.

HiredAssassin2.title: Assassí a sou
HiredAssassin2.desc: NAME es va convertir en un dels mestres dels robatoris, treballant sobretot pel crim organitzat. Amb el temps, és va fer un nom i va canviar el negoci de robar possessions de la gent al de robar-ne la vida.

VideoGamer91.title: Video gamer
VideoGamer91.desc: Ryan was raised in a glitterworld. Everything he wanted came to him. In school he was a social butterfly. At home, he spent his time looking up the newest gadgets and playing his favourite video games.

SpaceshipChef34.title: Spaceship chef
SpaceshipChef34.desc: Ryan got a spot on a ship by becoming the ship's cook. He enjoyed cooking and helping the doctor clean wounds, but he never got used to cleaning the dishes.

DreadedBaby55.title: Dreaded baby
DreadedBaby55.desc: NAME was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's data records, HE invented the nuclear device that powered his ship. Apparently, he also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have fathered a race of tasty golden kittens.

DreadedDude3.title: Dreaded dude
DreadedDude3.desc:
Some followers say that NAME and HIS crew of misfits found the Fountain of Youth, many, many centuries ago, and that they caused the extinction of the dinosaurs on many planets.
There's even a religion about them, somewhere, involving noodles and meatballs.

Tinkerer87.title: Tinkerer
Tinkerer87.desc: NAME grew up on a scrap-heap of a planet - the garbage dump of other planets in the system. He learned to make new machines from the dead parts of old ones. With some friends, he eventually escaped on a salvaged and repaired ship.

Engineer9.title: Engineer
Engineer9.desc: NAME found a job as a tinkering engineer on the trading hub planet Irithir. Tough local traders forced him to learn negotiation skills, and he made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

DisplacedNoble82.title: Displaced noble
DisplacedNoble82.desc: Born on an urbworld to the ruler of three megacities, NAME’s prospects looked good - until a violent insurrection overthrew HIS family. Exile introduced NAME to hard work and combat, but some high-born squeamishness remains.

Minister38.title: Minister
Minister38.desc: NAME managed to secure an important position in the government of a minor glitterworld. HECAP got used to the opulence, while attempting to keep HIS citizens content. HECAP had ample time for pleasure and indulgence – though HE never forgot how to do hard work.

ChessMaster23.title: Chess master
ChessMaster23.desc:
NAME loved to play chess. HECAP even earned the nickname Bishop for some of HIS craftier moves.
HECAP never got into trouble - mostly because he was good at not getting caught.

Pirate65.title: Pirate
Pirate65.desc:
As a pirate leader, Bishop was well-known for his cunning plans and chess-like traps. HECAP was never afraid to sacrifice a few pawns to capture an important target.
HISCAP name has been linked more then once to strategies that overcame overwhelming odds.

Orphan62.title: Orphan
Orphan62.desc: Born on a deep space station, NAME was orphaned at a young age. In the orphanage, he stood up for the weaker kids and fought off the bullies.

BountyHunter14.title: Bounty hunter
BountyHunter14.desc: NAME is a self-employed bounty hunter. HECAP spent HIS days hunting space pirates and collecting cash bounties.

Straggler99.title: Straggler
Straggler99.desc:
Despite being blessed with parental love, NAME hardly knew his parents.
HECAP was frequently left to his own devices which meant more time devoted to exploring his interests…and getting into trouble.

Spiceminer98.title: Spiceminer
Spiceminer98.desc:
NAME made his mark on the universe as a spice miner assigned to the lucrative mining colony of Rural Pen’The.
Little did he know, Benn was about to embark on a career path that would change his life.

BrutalThief33.title: Brutal thief
BrutalThief33.desc:
Growing up in a gang, NAME learned the brutality of the streets.
Knowing that showing weakness could be fatal, he closed himself of to others.

CrimeLord40.title: Crime lord
CrimeLord40.desc:
Through brutality and cruelty, NAME rose to the rank of crime lord.
He relied less on his fists and more on his guns. His reputation spread faster due to his cold-bloodedness and ruthless methods.

BoySoldier18.title: Nen soldat
BoySoldier18.desc:
La guerra sempre és igual, només canvien els protagonistes.
Nascut en un violent monciutat, NAME va ser entrenat des de jove per lluitar a les guerres dels altres, i va resultar tenir-hi traça.

MarbleDoctor3.title: Metge de combat
MarbleDoctor3.desc:
En un món arrasat per les bombes, els primers auxilis sovint són els únics que es poden rebre.
NAME aprofitava els seus coneixements mèdics per ajudar els ferits i els malalts. Creia que si les armes podien ser poderoses, un metge ho era encara més.

ApocalypseChild97.title: Apocalypse child
ApocalypseChild97.desc:
NAME spent his childhood on a post-apocalyptic world. He fought for survival from a young age, on a planet where trust did not exist.
He told everyone that he had no luck.

MobHenchman44.title: Mob henchman
MobHenchman44.desc: After being "saved" from his home world by a slaver ship, NAME was sold to an urbworld crime lord, where he was used as a henchman. He specialized in low-tech beat-downs and intimidation.

OrphanOfWar96.title: Orphan of war
OrphanOfWar96.desc:
NAME lost his family and home early in life. His life became emotionally hollow, but his painful memories drove him to survive.
HECAP took several jobs, but never achieved more than a basic education.

MechWarVeteran90.title: Mech war veteran
MechWarVeteran90.desc: NAME fought against swarms of rogue mechanoids since he was old enough to enlist. HECAP has bled on half a dozen worlds and has lost more than he cares to recall. These experiences left him hardened, both mentally and physically.

ImperialStudent92.title: Imperial student
ImperialStudent92.desc: NAME studied on an imperial midworld where guns were banned and self-defense study was encouraged. The relative safety allowed HIM to focus on HIS botanical research.

PoisonGardener85.title: Poison gardener
PoisonGardener85.desc:
NAME spent almost all HIS time tending to a poison garden and became withdrawn from society.
In that time HE learnt a few safe culinary and medicinal uses for the otherwise deadly plants.

PowerMadScholar58.title: Power-mad scholar
PowerMadScholar58.desc: "Knowledge is power." These words sparked something within NAME, and came to form his core drive. When not entombed within libraries, HE would take things apart to see first-hand how they worked, with little regard for the border between mechanical and organic.

ArtificerRampant50.title: Artificer rampant
ArtificerRampant50.desc:
Fuelled by the thrill of discovery and his own megalomania, NAME set out to invent new devices and improve existing ones, breaking laws and customs as necessary.
HECAP formed a crew to gather materials for HIS work - and to deal with outsiders who might interfere.

TechHead78.title: Cap tècnic
TechHead78.desc:
Dret sobre casc d’una nau amb el seu pare, dins un vestit EVA de mida infantil, NAME es va enamorar de l’espai.
El van apuntar al Programa Civil d’Estudis. Mentre imitava el seu pare, cuidava les plantes a la seva habitació desendreçada. Li van posar el sobrenom per que li agradaven les rodones.

SystemsEngineer27.title: Enginyer de sistemes
SystemsEngineer27.desc:
NAME es va convertir en un enginyer de sistemes com el seu pare. Es va titular tan en sistemes colonials com navals.
Quan no treballava, feia estatuetes mecàniques, llegia llibres vells i, de tant en tant, viatjava a planetes fora dels mapes. Introvertit com era, ho feia garie bé sempre tot sol.

Orphan91.title: Orfe
Orphan91.desc:
Abandonat al mon pels seus pares, NAME va fer el que va poder per adaptar-se.
Havia de cuidar-se i de tenir cura dels altres nens més petits de l’orfenat i va aprendre molt de les persones i de com interactuar-hi.

NeuroScientist84.title: Neurociencia
NeuroScientist84.desc:
NAME va treballar durant molt temps en la millora de la comprensió del cervell humà.
Després d’aconseguir fer el mapa complert del cervell, va unir-se a un equip amb la missió d’estudiar el cervell de les xeno-espècies.

Abductee39.title: Abductee
Abductee39.desc: NAME was abducted at a young age and forced to do menial labor on a pirate ship.

PirateCaptain0.title: Pirate captain
PirateCaptain0.desc: NAME worked his way up through the ranks of a pirate ship, eventually becoming captain. He leads his crew between worlds, making a name to remember.

BlackjackPlayer50.title: Blackjack player
BlackjackPlayer50.desc:
The only useful skill NAME learned from his tough military school was card counting. He amassed many enemies by cheating at casinos, becoming ever more edgy and violent as the threat of retaliation grew.
When he was finally caught, they burned half his skin off. He'll never be able to face fire or violence again.

HedgeFundManager27.title: Hedge fund manager
HedgeFundManager27.desc:
A top hedge fund manager on a teeming urbworld, NAME's portfolio grew rapidly as he charmed clients with a sweet voice and devious intent. When the deal turned out too good to be true, he was forced to flee the planet with a bounty on his head.
As he travelled the stars he found a passion in the arts, making masterpieces fit for high society customers.

AcademyStudent52.title: Academy student
AcademyStudent52.desc:
NAME went to school like a good space cadet would. He was very tall and was known for his good looks.
Though he worried more about his hairstyle than his grades, he still somehow passed the final exams.

ComputerEngineer28.title: Computer engineer
ComputerEngineer28.desc:
Bored of his code-monkey office job and missing the glory days of the Academy, NAME saw a commercial about the frontier where "only the strong survive".
With his wife Morgan, NAME undertook a journey into the unknown.

AspiringEngineer42.title: Aspiring engineer
AspiringEngineer42.desc:
NAME had a fascination with gadgets and gizmos. HECAP took apart and put together almost anything HE could find.
HECAP got used to repairing toys brought to HIM by other children, and even fixed a few devices from HIS elders.

ExpertHandyman95.title: Expert handyman
ExpertHandyman95.desc: NAME worked as a traveling engineer. HECAP fixed things ranging from a simple communications array to the intricate software harness in his ship's AI meta-core. Nothing is beyond repair for HIM.

MedicalStudent18.title: Estudiant de medicina
MedicalStudent18.desc:
NAME va néixer en un monbrillant, dins una família de metges i va voler seguir la tradició.
Tenia pocs amics, però s’ho passava molt bé amb els seus germans.

MedicSoldier37.title: Medic soldier
MedicSoldier37.desc:
NAME enrolled in his planetary army as a frontline medic. He soon knew the horrors of war and was deeply marked by them.
HECAP left the military and his homeworld and began researching medicine and helping those he came across.

HighBaroness49.title: Alta noblesa
HighBaroness49.desc:
NAME era descendent de baix rang d’una reial família imperial.
La van posar al cap del govern de seu planeta natal de ben jove, i va aprendre importants capacitats polítiques i culturals.

ExiledResearcher36.title: Investigadora exiliada
ExiledResearcher36.desc: L’amor per la tecnologia de NAME no va ser ben vist al tecnofòbic imperi. El Gran Carden al del sistema la va excomunicar i no se li va tornar permetre tornar mai.

WorldSlider50.title: World slider
WorldSlider50.desc: NAME was raised by a world-hopping band of criminals. HECAP learned not to leave evidence of his presence in case the group had to leave in a hurry. HECAP also learned about medicine and hand-to-hand combat from his fellow criminals.

Villain66.title: Villain
Villain66.desc: After rising to the top of his criminal band, NAME was taught the arts of villainy, from handling firearms to developing new weapons technologies. He excelled at bending others to his will.

MedicalStudent71.title: Estudiant de medicina
MedicalStudent71.desc: Descendent d’una llarga nissaga de metges, NAME va estudiar tots els camps de la medicina, des dels ungüents d’herbes a les drogues sintètiques. També va heretar un menyspreu saludable cap a les feines de classe baixa.

SpaceNavyDoctor40.title: Metge de nau espacial
SpaceNavyDoctor40.desc: NAME va treballar de metge en diversos viatges d’una de les poques naus de guerra del seu planeta. Va aprendre a lluitar una mica en els combats ocasionals contra pirates, i es va especialitzar en tractar ferides greus de combat.

AspergersRebel96.title: Aspergers rebel
AspergersRebel96.desc:
NAME grew up as a rebel on an formerly-advanced rimworld devastated by war.
HISCAP Aspergers syndrome meant he struggled with social situations and was incapable of caring, but HE learned hard skills like research and shooting very quickly.

GovernmentAgent80.title: Government agent
GovernmentAgent80.desc:
NAME worked for the government against rebel groups and excelled in this capacity. During HIS training HE was taught firearms, melee combat and medical skills.
Having grown up in a war-ravaged city, dirt, blood and dead bodies don’t bother HIM and HE sees no reason to clean them up.

ShootingComa31.title: Shooting coma
ShootingComa31.desc: Nebulys fell into a coma at a young age and spent years dreaming about shooting. When he awoke, he was useless at most tasks - but he could aim pretty well.

SelflessHunter57.title: Selfless hunter
SelflessHunter57.desc:
Nebulys was a hunter of mysterious creatures that many didn't even believe existed. Sometimes the people were right - and sometimes they were wrong.
Along the way, he helped people in need.

PsychologyStudent88.title: Psychology student
PsychologyStudent88.desc:
NAME researched new religions and traditions and often dreamt of distant stars.
His dreams prompted him to ask what lay beyond the lights in the sky.

AcolyteOfStars66.title: Acolyte of stars
AcolyteOfStars66.desc:
Ever the dreamer, NAME traveled across the universe to find the thing he felt was calling to him.
HECAP became poorer and poorer, but used every means possible to carry on.

SpaceSmuggler10.title: Contrabandista espacial
SpaceSmuggler10.desc:
Els pares de NAME el feien servir per passar contrband en un grup de planetes fronterers.
Gràcies a la seva petita mida, NAME va convertir-se en un expert en les missions dels seus pares, aprenent sobre armament, negociació i altres coses relacionades amb el contraban.

SpaceRaider65.title: Saquejador espacial
SpaceRaider65.desc: NAME era el cap de la tripulació d’un vehicle espacial. Amagant-se entre els planetes frontera, es va convertir en l’enemic més temut de molts assentaments.

Abductee2.title: Abduït
Abductee2.desc:
NAME va ser abduït per xenohumans quan encara era un nadó. Van experimentar amb ell per entendre l’estructura genètica humana.
Quan va créixer, ho va fer una mica massa gran i fort per als seus captors i va aconseguir escapar.

Spy40.title: Espia
Spy40.desc: NAME va ser entrenat pel seu govern en infiltració i espionatge. Va aprendre a mantenir el cap fred i superar situacions complicades parlant. Quan parlar no funcionava, era capaç d’accions directes més violentes.

BlessedChild86.title: Criatura beneïda
BlessedChild86.desc:
NAME va néixer sota bons auguris en un grup espiritual d’un monmitjà i l’han reverenciat tota la seva infància.
Va aprendre a preocupar-se dels pobres i auxiliar els fidels des de ben jove.

WanderingHealer6.title: Sanador ambulantr
WanderingHealer6.desc:
NAME va estudiar per ser metge, però no li agradava el treball plàcid del monmitjà.
En comptes d’això, va aixecar les arrels i va viatjar als planetes fronterers èr tenir cura de la gent que més ho necessitava.

YouthSoldier99.title: Soldat jove
YouthSoldier99.desc:
NAME va néixer en una llarga dinastia de soldats. Va seguir la tradició, unint-se a un programa d’entrenament militar.
Va excel·lir en tots els programes d’entrenament físics de la carrera de Marine, i fins i tot va superar la majoria dels exàmens d’intel·ligència. Tot i que no va ser mai gaire brillant ni espavilat, NAME va aprendre el valor del treball dur i el sofriment.

VeteranSoldier2.title: Soldat veterà
VeteranSoldier2.desc:
NAME va lluitar en molts atacs a pirates, rebels i xenos. Va sobreviure els horrors i la glòria de la guerra.
Desgastat per les ferides, les guerres i les cicatrius de combat, NAME es va «jubilar» a la vida social senzilla de les obligacions civils colonials. Passava els dies polint les medalles de guerra, sabent que havia fet honor a la seva nissaga familiar.

GlitterworldKid84.title: Criatura de monbrillant
GlitterworldKid84.desc:
Fill d’una «parella perfecta» dissenyada genèticament d’un mon brillant, NAME era molt més tímid, introvertit i nerviós que els seus pares. Estava pràcticament sempre sol, estudiant ciència i medicina i cuidant el jardí en el seu temps de lleure.
Durant l’adolescència, va fugir de casa buscant una vida més tranquil·la.

CosmeticReject89.title: Refús cosmètic
CosmeticReject89.desc:
Vivia pel carrer i NAME es va sotmetre a un experiment cosmètic poc ètic a canvi de refugi i menjar.
Després d’alguns doloroses modificacions cosmètiques, NAME no semblava el mateix. El van obligar a treballar al laboratori fins que va ser rescatat. Ara NAME està massa espantat per fer mal a ningú.

FeralChild73.title: Feral child
FeralChild73.desc:
NAME and his family lived a hard but prosperous lives along with their fellow colonists on a distant rimworld.
One day a group of mechanoids attacked, killing everyone aside from Robert. He then lived alone in the desert until a group of raiders found him.

RaiderKing70.title: Raider king
RaiderKing70.desc: Starting as nothing more than a slave, NAME rose quickly among the raider ranks until all knew his name and his ruthlessness.

Scout86.title: Scout
Scout86.desc:
Nate loved being outdoors. His parents enrolled him in a program that taught military scouting skills. He thrived when he was left alone in the wilderness.
Due to this upbringing, however, NAME did not learn the basic technological skills that are taken for granted by many others.

FrontierMarshal75.title: Frontier marshal
FrontierMarshal75.desc:
Nate was the marshal of his colony. He tried to honorably uphold the law, but the corrupt local mayor killed his family and left him for dead.
After regaining his health, Nate arrested the mayor. HECAP left his homeworld and started a new life working to make a difference in the universe.

TraineeAlchemist98.title: Trainee alchemist
TraineeAlchemist98.desc: NAME grew up on a medieval world. He learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on his planet.

ReligiousHierarch42.title: Religious hierarch
ReligiousHierarch42.desc:
Ordained as a priest in his local community, NAME used intrigue and diplomacy to rise to the higher echelon of the clergy. He held numerous titles and lands.
One day, a merchant landed his spaceship near NAME's home. HECAP decided to accompany the merchant in search for new worlds and challenges.

Pickpocket96.title: Carterista
Pickpocket96.desc: NAME va presenciar l’assassinat dels seus pares. Sense cap ajuda, es va haver d’espavilar com va poder. Es va unir a un petit grup d’esclosos socials i va fer el que va caler per sobreviure.

CriminalSurgeon8.title: Cirurgià de criminals
CriminalSurgeon8.desc:
Envoltat de molts companys criminals ferits, NAME va fer-se responsable de curar-los.
Tot i que en van morir forces, NAME va millorar en l’ús dels ganivets.

SpaceCadet12.title: Space cadet
SpaceCadet12.desc:
Growing up on a rural farm-world leaves little opportunity for excitement and adventure, so when the Royal Fleet began a recruiting program on his home planet, Jake threw down his hoe and cattle prod to took up arms for the crown.
He served on the interplanetary super-destroyer HMS Thunder-Child.

SanitationCaptain28.title: Sanitation captain
SanitationCaptain28.desc:
After graduating officer training school, Jake was assigned to main battle deck on the Thunder-Child. He served there for a year before his "gallant" actions saw him reassigned to the maintenance corps.
It was with the maintenance corps he was dubbed Table on account of his legs.

Naturalist25.title: Naturalist
Naturalist25.desc:
Mitch grew up on a backwater planet with minimal education. He had to hunt and grow food to survive.
HISCAP family's home was frequently raided for food by scavengers. This made Mitch very suspicious and slow to trust anyone he doesn't know.

OverwatchSniper73.title: Overwatch sniper
OverwatchSniper73.desc:
NAME didn't know why he joined the military, but he stayed to protect his fellow soldiers.
Army life broke him down and built him back up. It taught him marksmanship, hand to hand combat and how to patch a bullet wound in a hurry.

Drudge47.title: Drudge
Drudge47.desc:
NAME was never sure what HE wanted to do with HIS life. HECAP spent most of HIS time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what HIS future would be like.
HECAP entertained himself with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

GalacticSightseer55.title: Galactic sightseer
GalacticSightseer55.desc:
NAME traveled the stars. HECAP could barely scrape together travel costs doing odd-jobs on stations, but it was all worth it. Seeing the wonders of the galaxy was where HE found HIS calling.
HECAP loved camping on exotic worlds and learning the patterns of strange wildlife. The wonders of the universe inspired HIM like nothing else could.

ChildOfDrifters15.title: Child of drifters
ChildOfDrifters15.desc: Ever since HE was very small, NAME had never known a home beyond HIS parent's ship. They were a family of nomads whose meandering provided a constant change of scenery. HISCAP life was often perilous but never dull, and HE inherited HIS parents' wanderlust at a young age.

WanderingCrafter28.title: Wandering crafter
WanderingCrafter28.desc: NAME continued to follow HIS parents' nomadic ways, supporting himself with his crafting skills. But wandering is a hard life, and HE often thought of finding somewhere to settle down and put HIS skills to good use.

TribalThunderer25.title: Espetegador tribal
TribalThunderer25.desc: Fa anys, la tribu de NAME va topar amb un dipòsit d’armes abandonat. Creient que les armes eren objectes sagrats, els xaman va seleccionar un nou nascut en circumstàncies supersticioses i li va atorgar l’honor de portar una de les armes per defensar el poble. NAME era aquest nen.

MutinousCaptain49.title: Capità amotinat
MutinousCaptain49.desc:
NAME va ser portat a les estrelles pels esclavistes després d’haver delmat la tribu en un atac. Amb els anys va aprendre l’idioma dels seus captors i va arribar a treballar per ells com a interpret i diplomàtic.
El capità només va conèixer de veritat en NAME quan va ser capturat pel motí que va organitzar.

CorpBredStudent62.title: Corp-bred student
CorpBredStudent62.desc:
NAME was bred to become an executive for the space exploration corporation that owned his home planet. HISCAP family had been working for that corporation for four generations.
At age five, HE enrolled at the corporate academy where he learned loyalty and ruthlessness. NAME excelled in finding diplomatic solutions where others would need violence.

CorpResearcher37.title: Corp researcher
CorpResearcher37.desc: NAME was a leading researcher for a massive space exploration corporation.

EarthColonist29.title: Earth colonist
EarthColonist29.desc: NAME was born on Earth. As a child, HECAP was launched into space as part of an interstellar colonization program.

SoleSurvivor46.title: Sole survivor
SoleSurvivor46.desc: NAME lived in a remote colony. When mechanoid centipedes attacked his home and killed his people, he was the last survivor.

MilitaryTrainee74.title: Entrenament militar
MilitaryTrainee74.desc: NAME va créixer en una base militar del sistema Xennoa. Va sotmetre’s a moltes i diverses activitats duríssimes i va muscular molt quan encara era una criatura. També va aprende a negociar, tractaments mèdics i tàctiques militars.

AWOLSoldier54.title: AWOL soldier
AWOLSoldier54.desc:
NAME was an infantryman.
When HE was informed of his assignment to the Xennoa-Zartza War, HE decided HE did not want to be a soldier. He was able to escape via military spacejet.

Bookworm75.title: Bookworm
Bookworm75.desc: NAME spent his youth in the library, reading every book he could about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating tales of the mechanoid races. He vowed that one day, he would see these things for himself.

Explorer36.title: Explorer
Explorer36.desc: NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. He hoped one day to compile a record of every animal, plant, mineral, and machine and device in known space: The Complete Traveler's Guide to the RimWorlds.

ColonyKid89.title: Colony kid
ColonyKid89.desc:
NAME was born the child of two doctors in a small colony. Because of HIS parents, HE was always interested in science and medicine.
NAME never really got along with other children, and as a result became withdrawn and unsociable.

StarshipDoctor78.title: Starship doctor
StarshipDoctor78.desc: NAME was a doctor on a starship. He was a brilliant surgeon and dabbled in research of his own. However, he was quite reclusive and never had the best bedside manner.

CaravanChild53.title: Infant de caravana
CaravanChild53.desc:
NAME va néixer al vaixell mercant d’un monciutat de mare emprenedora i pare absent. Va néixer mascle, però no li van agradar mai les coses de nois i sempre es posava la roba de sa mare.
Un dia van viatjar amb la seva mare a un monbrillant i es van gastar tots els estalvis en transformar el seu cos en un en el qual se sentís feliç.

BountyHunter28.title: Caça recompenses
BountyHunter28.desc: NAME era caçadora de recompenses en un immens monbrillant. Va fer alguns treballs mol delicats per clients rics, i era coneguda pel silenci i la discreció dels seus treballs.

ReEducatedYouth32.title: Jove reeducat
ReEducatedYouth32.desc:
NAME viva en un monmitjà on el govern creia que el jovent era important.
Va ser un dels molts infants que van ser retirats als seus pares i forçats a entrar als nous programes d’educació.

FallenOfficial20.title: Funcionari fugit
FallenOfficial20.desc:
NAME era oficial en un govern autòcrata.
Quan els seus superiors li van demanar de participar en uns actes que va considerar atroços, NAME s’hi va negar i va fugir del seu planeta amb res més que la roba que duia posada.

AccursedChild43.title: Infant maleit
AccursedChild43.desc:
NAME va néixer al punt màxim d’un eclipsi lunar. Els ancians el van declarar una criatura de la foscor lliurada a ells per tenir-ne cura.
Va passar tota la infància estudiant els costums i rituals del seu poble, a l’espera del dia de la crida.

ShamanOfShadows30.title: Xaman de les ombres
ShamanOfShadows30.desc:
Quan els monstres del foc van caure del cel, la tribu va demanar a NAME que els guies en la batlla.
NAME va fer servir les medicines i els rituals per inspirar i liderar els guerrers de moltes tribus contra els invasors. Els pirates es van haver de retirar sense fer ni un esclau.

AmateurAstronomer76.title: Astrònom aficionat
AmateurAstronomer76.desc:
NAME estava fascinat per l’astronomia. Es podia passar hores mirant els planetes i les nebulosos pel telescopi.
Se li va reconèixer el descobriment d’un petit cometa que s’hauria, al cap dels anys, estavellat contra una lluna propera i pertorbat els treballs de mineria que s’hi feien.

StationSecurity1.title: Seguretat d’estació
StationSecurity1.desc:
NAME va ser assignat com a agent especial en una xarxa d’estacions espacials. Es cuidava de prevenir el trafic il·legal de persones.
Una vegada, es va declarar foc a l’estació i va salvar molta gent de les flames. Des de llavors procura evitar el foc.

FarmHand94.title: Treballador de granja
FarmHand94.desc:
NAME va néixer en una granja d’un petit planeta colonial.
Tot es feia amb l’ajut dels pocs membres que ocupaven la granja, incloent a NAME. Això el va ajudar a tenir independència, esperit i un caràcter afable.

SpaceTrafficker87.title: Traficant espacial
SpaceTrafficker87.desc:
NAME va descobrir que era l’hereu d’un oncle llunya que tenia un negoci armamentístic.
Per protegir el futur de la companyia es va sotmetre a un intensiu entrenament militar, per si es donaven «circumstàncies imprevistes».

EnergeticPopIdol4.title: Ídol del pop energètica
EnergeticPopIdol4.desc:
NAME es va criar en un monbrillant, practicant el cant i la lluita amb estoc. Va ser durant diversos anys una ídol del pop energètica.
Tot i això, va decidir que la música i la indústria de la moda no li feien prou cas i ho va deixar.

PopIdolPirate25.title: Pirata ídol del pop
PopIdolPirate25.desc:
NAME i els seus fans es van enrolar en una nau pirata. Assaltaven corporacions per robar-los els diners i feien actuacions per donar-se a conéixer.
NAME va agafar por del foc quan un rival va calar foc a l’escenari. Confiava en els seus fans per fer les feines que no li agraden.

IcePlanetChild56.title: Infant de planeta glaçat
IcePlanetChild56.desc:
Crescut a les devastacions gelades d’una lluna oceànica, NAME només va poder gaudir de la companyia d’animals i mariners rudes.
LA manca d’interacció social li van fer desenvolupar interès per l’enginyeria, però no l’amor per la humanitat.

Roboticist87.title: Roboticista
Roboticist87.desc:
Els mariners sovint morien a les aigües perilloses del planeta oceànic de NAME. Va crear robots per reemplaçar-los.
Amb el temps, va tenir un petit grup de robots que li feien la feina. Es va convertir en un expert en mecànica i enginyeria, però va perdre el gust per les feines manuals.

ToxicChild59.title: Infant tòxic
ToxicChild59.desc:
Crescut en un planeta industrial, NAME va començar a treballar en una planta química a les sis. Els anys exposats a les toxines industrials el van deixar mentalment malalt.
Va fer volar pels aires les instal·lacions i va escapar del planeta en una nau de càrrega robada.

StalwartFarmer91.title: Granger fidel
StalwartFarmer91.desc:
Amb la granja sempre amenaçada pels malfactors, NAME va aprendre a defensar-se amb el rifle del seu pare. També va aprendre a fer bons corrals per mantenir els depredadors lluny del bestiar.
Un cop va provar de dibuixar casa seva, i va descobrir que només sabia fer ànecs i guixots.

BoyScout19.title: Escolta
BoyScout19.desc:
NAME pertanyia a un grup escolta d’un monmitjà.
Va aprendre moltes tècniques de supervivència com ara espavilar-se a la intempèrie i tractament bàsic de ferides.

UrbworldPimp46.title: Macarró de monciutat
UrbworldPimp46.desc:
Al principi, NAME feia quatre quartos venent droga. Llavors va passar a vendre dones i va fer una fortuna.
Va desenvolupar molta traça amb els punys. També va aprendre a curar les ferides que ell mateix feia a les noies.

ScienceProdigy96.title: Científic prodigi
ScienceProdigy96.desc:
NAME era el millor a la classe de química, de fisica, exobiologia, astronomia i opera.
Un malaurat accident al laboratori li va deixar com a seqüela una por a mort al foc.

ParticlePhysicist6.title: Científic de partícules
ParticlePhysicist6.desc: NAME va fer investigació física puntera Volia ajudar a construir un futur millor i més pacífic.

SpeederRacer68.title: Speeder racer
SpeederRacer68.desc:
Rusty was the son of a fern farmer in the towering forests of Khalderia.
He found his first love in speeder racing, zipping in and out of the massive canopies and gorgeous vistas of his homeworld. The seedy underworld of racing also forced him to learn to defend himself with a quick word or a quicker shot.

DefenseLawyer2.title: Defense lawyer
DefenseLawyer2.desc:
NAME found that HE could make more money with a quick word than a blaster. Seeking a job where HIS silver tongue could be useful, HE turned to the law.
HECAP often defended the illegal speeder racers HE grew up with.

MercenaryRecruit61.title: Mercenary recruit
MercenaryRecruit61.desc: Born to a long line of off-world mercenaries, NAME grew up in a busy trading hub. At a young age, HE was recruited into one of the mercenary crews.

Ranger8.title: Ranger
Ranger8.desc: NAME lived alone, deep in a forest. HECAP protected the wildlife against poachers, and learned to satisfy HIS own material needs without outside help.

MarineCadet8.title: Marine cadet
MarineCadet8.desc:
NAME was in a planetary marine cadet program.
HECAP was kicked out for shooting an officer. It was never established whether this was an accident.

ClanChief70.title: Clan chief
ClanChief70.desc: NAME managed a small criminal clan on an outlying trade hub world.

YoungPsychologist60.title: Young psychologist
YoungPsychologist60.desc:
NAME was born and raised on a poor midworld, in the front passenger seat of HIS mother's cab.
Watching pedestrians and listening to the taxi passengers all day long, HE soon became very good at figuring out someone's real purpose.

FactionLeader69.title: Faction leader
FactionLeader69.desc:
Early in HIS adulthood, NAME found HIMself surrounded by a gaggle of low-lifes.
For fun, HE gathered them and lead them to a certain death. HECAP knew then that HE had the talent to realize HIS ambitions of leadership.

LabGrownChild20.title: Lab-grown child
LabGrownChild20.desc:
NAME was born in a laboratory as part of a altruistic but failed attempt to create a new class of human.
HISCAP childhood was filled with books and one-on-one tutoring. He was awkward, shy, and naive to the true nature of humanity.

CorpResearcher9.title: Corp researcher
CorpResearcher9.desc:
NAME was sold to a corporation and put to work as a corporate slave doing scientific research.
Unable to adapt to the social politics of his workplace, he buried himself in his work and failed to progress up the corporate ladder. Every day, he yearned to be left alone.

TechScholar7.title: Escola de tecnologia
TechScholar7.desc:
NAME era un jove alumne del ram de la ciència i la tecnologia.
S’esforçava cada dia a millorar les seves habilitats intelectuals.

TechnologyDoctor90.title: Doctorat en tecnologia
TechnologyDoctor90.desc:
NAME va fer recerca en combustibles de propulsió i generació d’energia.
Li encantava la investigació tecnològica, i n’esperava poder millorar la qualitat de vida de l’especie humana.

PitGladiator18.title: Gladiador de pou
PitGladiator18.desc:
NAME va ser esclavitzat de petit i obligat a lluitar amb altres persones i amb animals en una arena de lluita soterrada.
Va mostrar destresa amb l’esport i va aconseguir comprar la llibertat. Tot i això, el temps passat als pous no li van estimular la ment, precisament.

PirateTrooper88.title: Pirata d’assalt
PirateTrooper88.desc:
NAME es va unir a una renovada organització criminal interestel·lar, i era sovint part dels equips d’assalt durant els raids a naus espacials.
Tot i que la seva experiència en combat el feien un bon lluitador, la rudesa de la feina el van tornar fred i poc entusiasta per les interaccions socials.

FactoryWorker58.title: Treballador de fàbrica
FactoryWorker58.desc:
NAME va créixer en una gran ciutat de fàbriques en un planeta industrial.
Com que la pobresa era molt elevada i el menjar escàs, va treballar per qualsevol sou que li poguessin donar. No era una vida fàcil, però NAME no va mai fugir d’un dia de treball dur.

CombatMedic16.title: Metge de combat
CombatMedic16.desc:
Després que els seu país entrés en una guerra a gran escala, NAME va ser enrolat cm a metge de combat.
Els anys a les trinxeres intentant mantenir en vida els seus companys soldats li van proporcionar un gran tècnica pels primers auxilis. La pèrdua de molts amics el van fer estoic i reservat.

RichBoy51.title: Rich boy
RichBoy51.desc:
NAME grew up on a midworld with loving parents, a cute pet and a lot of money - but no friends.
HECAP was always told by his father that 'those peasants just want your money'. So, HE spent most of his time alone, or fighting other kids.

HiredGun99.title: Hired gun
HiredGun99.desc:
NAME always wanted to prove HE could make a living without HIS parents' help. HECAP did shady jobs that often involved pointing guns at innocent people.
He eventually made enough money to board a cheap freighter. He discovered why it was so cheap when it crashed.

Athlete75.title: Athlete
Athlete75.desc:
NAME was professional athlete at early age. Thanks to her skills, she was able to leave her homeworld and enroll in a glitterworld university of science and technology.
Because of her demanding schedule and introverted nature, she became socially inept.

StilettoAssassin10.title: Stiletto assassin
StilettoAssassin10.desc:
Because of her skills, NAME developed a sense of superiority. In time, she lost her sense of empathy. She often got into fights, and discovered how easy it is to kill a person.
After realizing her talents, she became one of the most efficient assassins in the system.

SoleSurvivor99.title: Únic supervivent
SoleSurvivor99.desc:
La tribu sencera de NAME va se exterminada per una pesta.
Va ser trobat per una altra tribu que el va adoptar, però no es va sentir mai unit a cap dels altres membres de la seva nova tribu. Preferia estar sempre fora de la seva nova llarg, passejant pels boscos i cuidant els animals.

Hunter7.title: Caçador
Hunter7.desc:
NAME era una gran caádor.
Va aprendre a seguri la pista de qualsevol animal i posar-los trampes als llocs més perillosos, i sabia moltes maneres enginyoses d’abatre alguns animals específics.

MechanoidHacker35.title: Expert en mecanòides
MechanoidHacker35.desc:
Únic fill d’un respectat inventor de mecanòides, NAME va tenir accés als materials necessaris per modificar i transformar les creacions de son pare.
Feia servir drogues per ser més productiu. Malauradament els efectes secundaris incloïen deliris persistents de convertir-se ell mateix en mecanòide, la qual cosa va perjudicar la seva vida social.

BattlefieldTech63.title: Tècnic de combat
BattlefieldTech63.desc:
NAME va rebre entrenament en armes de foc, però la seva feina es centrava en la seva manipulació i adaptació tècnica als mecanòides de combat en el camp de batalla.
Va desenvolupar TEPT després d’escapar per molt poc d’un bombardeig en un camp de blat. Va ser descartat per al servei pels metges.

ProjectSubject48.title: Individu de project
ProjectSubject48.desc:
NAME va ser escollit per agents del govern pel misteriós «Projecte Marc».
Tanmateix, deguts als bloquejos de memòria, en recorda molt poca cosa del projecte o dels sues veritables objectius. Només que van haver molt pocs supervivents.

MasterTrader3.title: Master trader
MasterTrader3.desc: NAME was a master at trading. HECAP earned his nickname by helping a village through a trying time.

HexCellArtist19.title: Hex-cell artist
HexCellArtist19.desc:
NAME crafted sculptures from spent hex-cells and traded them to a local museum for food.
After HIS popularity grew, HE was approached by a pirate and abducted. The pirate kept HIM prisoner and forced HIM to create sculptures for sale.

ExoticChef84.title: Exotic chef
ExoticChef84.desc:
NAME has always gone overboard when it comes to food. HECAP is always seeking new and exotic ingredients.
HISCAP quest for ingredients has brought HIM into some close calls with local flora and fauna.

PlagueProdigy12.title: Plague prodigy
PlagueProdigy12.desc:
NAME's childhood was cut short when a mysterious plague hit his homeworld.
HECAP watched his friends die, and his compassion for humanity died with them. In its place a new thirst for knowledge emerged.

MadScientist79.title: Mad scientist
MadScientist79.desc:
NAME's lust for knowledge was only matched by his disdain for anyone who would stand in the way of his research.
Traveling from world to world, he sought answers to questions few dared to ask.

PoorKid76.title: Infant pobre
PoorKid76.desc: Després de l’abandonament dels seus pares, NAME va apendre a sobreviure en la solitud quan tot just tenia 10 anys.

Warrior43.title: Guerrer
Warrior43.desc: NAME es va convertir en heroi durant la tercera guerra mundial del seu planeta. Va aconseguir evitar el llançament d’armes nuclears quan tots dos bàndols pretenien desequilibrar la tensa igualtat en que es trobaven.

Dreamer11.title: Somiador
Dreamer11.desc:
NAME era un infant expressiu. Cantava sovint i feia amics de seguida, tant joves com grans, homes o dones.
No li agradava gents barallar-se, però quan s’enfadava podia ser perillós, i s’enfadava amb facilitat.

SpaceExplorer81.title: Explorador espacial
SpaceExplorer81.desc:
NAME va passar deu anys atrapat i sol en un planeta alienígena. Es va adaptar ràpidament al clima i va aprendre a comunicar-se amb els seus enemics.
Taquest llarg període de solitud va fer que perdés tots els bons amics. Té el cor sensible, però ha aprés a amagar molt bé les emocions.

UrbworldUrchin13.title: Gamberro de monciutat
UrbworldUrchin13.desc:
NAME va néixer en el més fosc dels suburbis del seu planeta urbà. La mare no li feia cas i va aprendre a sobreviure, barallant-se per cada mica de menjar que trobava.
Com que era millor que els demés, va poder sortir de la misèria i deixar enrere la seva mare.

Smuggler62.title: Contrabandista
Smuggler62.desc:
Treballant com a pilot, NAME tenia un mètode per robar i fer contraban sense aixecar sospites.
Va arribar a estalviar prou per comprar la seva pròpia nau, que feia servir per fer els seus propis negocis.

MilitaryRecruit62.title: Military recruit
MilitaryRecruit62.desc:
NAME was born on a midworld run by an intensely militaristic dictatorship.
From a young age, HE was trained to be a good soldier. They taught him how to use a gun and how to fight with melee weapons.

DestroyerGeneral40.title: Destroyer-general
DestroyerGeneral40.desc:
NAME held the rank of Destroyer-General in a powerful midworld military.
HECAP was known for his mastery of weapons, and was also a good ship pilot.

StreetUrchin51.title: Gamberro de carrer
StreetUrchin51.desc:
NAME va néixer en una famíla pobre d’un monciutat i va ser abandonat amb molt pocs anys.
Va aprendre a robar i matar per sobreviure pels carrers, aprenent a lluitar cos a cos i a distància. No tenia gaires oportunitats per parlar.

SerialMurderer52.title: Serial murderer
SerialMurderer52.desc:
NAME started to enjoy killing people, so he did more often and perfected his methods. He lurked in the darkest streets, stalking prey for hours.
He enjoyed making artworks of his victims, and was known for leaving his signature on the bodies of those he killed.

KidScientist80.title: Infant científic
KidScientist80.desc: Name va néixer dins una família influent i va rebre la millor educació que es pot pagar amb diners. Va demstrar ben aviat tenir una intel·ligència superior a la mitjana. Però la manca d’empatia li portava problemes amb els sues pares i amb els mestres.

MadScientist65.title: Científic boig
MadScientist65.desc:
Un cop acabada la carrera, NAME es va posar a treballar pel laboratori de genètica punta del planeta. Li van acabar descobrint unes investigacions il·legals i inhumanes.
Tot i la influència de la seva família, va patir condemna de preso i treballs forçats en una colònia penal.

MedievalThief74.title: Lladre Medieval
MedievalThief74.desc:
NAME va créixer en la misèria i la fam d’un planeta medieval, on va aprendre a sobreviure.
Primer només robava el que necessitava. Després va aprendre a robar el que volia.

HumanTrafficker69.title: Traficant de persones
HumanTrafficker69.desc:
NAME raptava criatures petites de casa seva per vendre-les.
Amb el temps, ha anat perdent la mica de moral que li quedava.

TraumatizedYouth62.title: Joventut traumàtica
TraumatizedYouth62.desc:
NAME vivia en un tranquil monmitjà.
La seva mare era protifòbica i va emmalaltir del cor. Desesperat, el seu pare va raptar gent i els va treure el cor. Va ser arrestat, però NAME encara viu amb el trauma de l’experiència.

MentalPatient64.title: Pacient mental
MentalPatient64.desc:
Van ingressar NAME a un hospital psiquiàtric. Allà matava el temps en les tranquil·les activitats de l’asil.
Li van donar l’alta, però li va quedar la distància emociona, la curiositat per l’anatomia humana i la rialleta maníaca.

YouthSoldier75.title: Soldat jove
YouthSoldier75.desc:
Descendent d’una llarga nissaga de soldats, NAME es va allistar a un programa d’entrenament militar.
Va destacar en l’entrenament físic i fins i tot va aprovar la majoria d’exàmens d’intel·ligència. Com que no era particularment espavilat i llest, NAME va aprendre el valor de treballar dur i patir.

SpaceMarine48.title: Marine espacial
SpaceMarine48.desc:
NAME era un guerrer de la marina Imperial.
La seva feina era assaltar les naus enemigues, abatre’n la tripulació i capturar la nau intacta. I se li donava bé.

GalacticPage15.title: Galactic page
GalacticPage15.desc:
NAME served the high admiral of a space fleet. HECAP learned the ways of court, including etiquette and speechcraft.
In his feudal society, it was considered a great honor to serve a man of such prestige.

EnvoyOfTheStars91.title: Envoy of the stars
EnvoyOfTheStars91.desc:
NAME entered the diplomatic corps. Honor and tradition were the values he took with him on every mission.
HISCAP prestigious position distanced him from backbreaking manual labor, allowing HIM to focus on his wordsmithing abilities. He left the blacksmithing to others.

ApprenticeSmith9.title: Apprentice smith
ApprenticeSmith9.desc:
NAME grew up helping in his father's smithy.
They were some of the last smiths on the planet that to use traditional smithing methods. They even collect some materials themselves.
Sometimes, after work, NAME would practice using the swords HE forged.

Blacksmith32.title: Blacksmith
Blacksmith32.desc: As a blacksmith on a medieval world, NAME gained a reputation for the high quality of HIS work. HECAP wasn't bad at using the swords HE forged either.

CloneFarmed43.title: Clone-farmed
CloneFarmed43.desc: Clone children are seeded into organic-rich wombvats and rapidly grown in a simmed universe. They're harvested later, sometimes for food, sometimes for organs, sometimes for workers - but they're always called 'Disposable'.

CloneFarmer72.title: Clone farmer
CloneFarmer72.desc: Harvesting the products of clone farms is mostly done by the clones themselves -particularly to those whose sims tended towards the social. This clone was one such, who escaped from the farms and headed out to the stars.

GangMember12.title: Gang member
GangMember12.desc:
NAME grew up without parents. HISCAP whole life was spent alone, fighting for survival on the streets.
No matter how hard it became to survive, he never gave up.

GangBoss0.title: Gang boss
GangBoss0.desc:
To survive, NAME's gang often had to rob interstellar traders for food and supplies. Sometimes he had to kill the guards. Sometimes he had to kill the police who arrived to stop him.
After years of this, he became one of the most-wanted criminals in the local stellar empire.

MilitantChild30.title: Militant child
MilitantChild30.desc:
NAME's military family forced him to train in hand-to-hand combat and fighting tactics.
In his own time, he built small inventions. This sharpened his mind.

LostMarine68.title: Lost marine
LostMarine68.desc:
Shortly after being promoted to a respected position in his planet's military, NAME disappeared without a trace.
Later, he reappeared at the head of his own military force. No one knows why he became who he was.

Killer70.title: Assassina
Killer70.desc:
NAME era una nena assedegada de sang. Els del poble creien que era el producte de la unió d’una serp demoníaca i un home.
Després de presenciar cim el seu pare humà traïa i matava la seva mare, va voler comprovar quantes persones podia ella fer caure amb les seves pròpies mans.

Healer46.title: Curandera
Healer46.desc:
NAME es va agafar un temps per admirar la bellesa del planeta.
La seva agressivitat latent l’encenia de tant en tant, però mirava d’adaptar-la a la seva vida cambiant.

ProfessionalGamer86.title: Professional gamer
ProfessionalGamer86.desc:
NAME was obsessed with video games since his hands were big enough to grip a joystick.
HECAP achieved middling finishes in several local tournaments during the 16-bit era. Nobody noticed when he retired early in his teenage years.

ToasterRepairman81.title: Toaster repairman
ToasterRepairman81.desc:
Good with his hands and passionate about technology, NAME aspired to invent gadgets and machines that would change his home world forever.
A few failed and occasionally disastrous creations later, he gave up on his dream and took a job more befitting his skill set.

DataDecoder25.title: Data decoder
DataDecoder25.desc:
Born on a glitterworld, NAME was very interested in the process of documenting information, and quickly became senior glitterpedia recorder.
HECAP was effective at self-study, but HE was lacked in social experiences.

ArchotechSpy14.title: Archotech spy
ArchotechSpy14.desc:
NAME was a cybernetic researcher. Studying a transcended world, HE became too involved with HIS subjects. Over time, the archotech machine core recruited HIM into its service, and used HIM as a spy.
When HE later rebelled against HIS non-human master, it sent mechanoids across space to hunt HIM down.

WolfPackMember79.title: Manada de llops
WolfPackMember79.desc:
NAME va ser abandonat per la seva família. Uns llops HE van criar, corrent, caçant i defensant la manada.
Va aprendre a defensar-se bé amb ungles i dents. També va aprendre estratègies brutals i primitives de caçar.

BehaviourResearch99.title: Investig. conducta
BehaviourResearch99.desc:
Van capturar NAME i van forçar la seva introducció a la societat moderna. És va adaptar molt ràpid i es va fer investigació del comportament i va arribar a crear les seves pròpies instal·lacions.
Es va especialitzar en canins, però va prendre molt sobre la resta d’animals. Les plantes no li van interessar mai.

RebelStudent39.title: Rebel student
RebelStudent39.desc:
NAME grew up in a modest but privileged family who encouraged him to play chess and shoot skeet at a young age.
As a bored student, HE found joy in challenging his teachers about the contradictions between his planet's official values and their government's policies.

PoliticalActivist61.title: Political activist
PoliticalActivist61.desc:
Matt was involved with a radical political faction which worked against his homeworld's government.
The guerilla tactics training that Matt received from his associates gave him the skills to fight, but also drove him to compromise his own beliefs.

Cadet99.title: Cadet
Cadet99.desc:
Nascut al planeta de Nova China, El pare de NAME era cap de la policia i molt estricte amb els seus fills.
NAME Havia de fer exercicis d’entrenament d’estil militar cada dia i havia de tenir l’habitació impecable, sempre apunt per passar revista. Va acabar odiant la violència.

Flaneur73.title: Flâneur
Flaneur73.desc:
NAME voltava i passejava pels carrers i cafès del seu planeta, buscant la llibertat a cada cantonada, sense cap lligam.
Durant aquesta epoca no es va fiar mai de res ni va rebre ordres de ningú.

ShipTechnician62.title: Tècnic de nau
ShipTechnician62.desc:
NAME era un aprenent de tècnic en naus comercials que feien rutes entre estacions i planetes del seu sistema natal. Allà va aprender a arreglar i millorar màquines.
A vegades, la seva nau era designada per a curtes sortides d’exploració a regions perilloses de l’espai.

ChiefEngineer74.title: Cap d’enginyers
ChiefEngineer74.desc:
Com a cap d’enginyers en una gran nau espacial, NAME dominava tota mena de feines complicades i difícils.
Delegava en altres membres de la tripulació les feines més bàsiques del dia a dia. Va desaparèixer amb la seva nau en un llarg viatge d’exploració.

BlacksmithsSon72.title: Fill de ferrer
BlacksmithsSon72.desc:
El pare de NAME tenia una ferreteria en un districte decadent d’una vella ciutat. NAME ajudava al seu pare quan podia.
Més endavant, el seu pare va fer-li de mestre ferrer. NAME tenia el tir com a hobi.

BlacksmithShooter88.title: Ferrer tirador
BlacksmithShooter88.desc:
Quan era un jove ferrer, la botiga de la família de NAME va ser assaltada per la policia. NAME va disparar a dos oficials abans que la policia el pogués detenir.
Sentenciat a presó per tota la vida, NAME va aprendre dels altres criminals a robar i amagar-se.

JoywireAddict67.title: Addic. al circ. de l’alegr.
JoywireAddict67.desc:
Els pares de NAME ere rics i li donaven tot el que demanava. Fins que va descobrir els circuits de l’alegria i es va obsessionar. Quan els seus pares ho van descobrir, el van repudiar.
No es cuidava i sovint protagonitzava actes violents. Buscava la següent recàrrega del circuit amb tots els mitjans que tenia a l’abast.

AddictionCounsel61.title: Consell per drogaddictes
AddictionCounsel61.desc:
Després de recuperar-se de la seva addicció als circuits de l’alegria, NAME va optar per un sistema de vida no violent i dedicat a ajudar els altres.
Viatjant d’una comunitat a una altra, feia servir la medicina, l’art i els treballs manuals per ajudar els altres a desfer-se de la seva adicció.

ChildKnave65.title: Criatura gamberra
ChildKnave65.desc:
NAME era el noi al servei del rei Loteric. Li encantava entrenar am els pals de fusta i enfrontar-se cos a cos. Es va adaptar ràpidament al fragor de la batalla i era bo disparant.
Va servir bé al seu senyor fins que el rei va morir en un malaurat accident.

BloodgameSurvivor96.title: Superviv. als jocs de sang
BloodgameSurvivor96.desc:
NAME va ser venut a la Companyia d’Entreteniments Nucli d’Estrella i el van ocupar com a carnassa en un dels espectacles que giraven per tot el sistema.
El temperament de NAME el va convertir en un malson, fins i tot pel públic. Va ser expulsat i exiliat a un planeta ple d’animals mortals, criminals i drons amb armes i càmera.

WastelandWanderer2.title: Rodamón d’erm
WastelandWanderer2.desc:
Nascut en una família rica en un planeta desèrtic, NAME va ser desterrat després d’un atac per encàrrec que va destruir el seu casal familiar.
Va aconseguir amagar-se en un dels conductes de refrigeració al soterrani del casal. Jurant venjant-se dels assassins i de qui els havia llogat, NAME va sortir al desert, sol.

VoidspaceRaider8.title: Bandoler sideral
VoidspaceRaider8.desc:
Després d’anys de recerca dels assassins de la seva família, va oferir a NAME entrar en un grup de bandolers siderals. Va acceptar amb la convicció que podria descobrir-hi l’assassí que havia vist.
La seva increïble capacitat d’escapar per molt poc de les situacions de perill li van donar el sobrenom de 'Blackjack' en reconeixement de la seva bona sort.

PyroAssistant17.title: Assistent de foct
PyroAssistant17.desc:
En un planeta industrial, el primer que va aprendre NAME és que si volia menjar, havia de treballar. Així que es va posar a treballar. La gent petita entrava be als llocs no no es podien ficar els adults, i allà les normes de seguretat eren més aviat flexibles.
Sempre havia tingut tendència a la piromania, i el van fer fora de la cuina per un desafortunat incident.

MachineFixer97.title: Reparació de màquines
MachineFixer97.desc:
NAME es va aficionar a solucionar problemes mecànics, sempre que no involucraven a la cuina.
Tota la vida entre maquinària perillosa i productes inflamables li van ensenyar a curar-se prou bé. Malgrat el dolor de les cremades, no va perdre la seva fascinació pel foc.

StreetUrchin39.title: Gamberro de carrer
StreetUrchin39.desc:
Després de fugir de casa, NAME va viure al carrer.
Va créixer ràpid i va aprendre aviat a enganyar a la gent per que hi confiessin.

SpaceMerchant61.title: Mercader espacial
SpaceMerchant61.desc: Com a part del seu estil de vida interplanetari, NAME volia dominar els seus interessos romàntics tan com la seva competència. Mentre no va tenir la seva propia nau, es va llogar per treballar en vols xàrter.

ChildChemist73.title: Químic infantil
ChildChemist73.desc:
NAME era un infant d’un monmitjà amb una fixació per descobrir com funcionaven exactament les coses.
Recollia objectes estranys i hi feia experiments perillosos. La concentració en els seus experiments, va anar fent que s’aillés de la resta del món. Només sortia del seu espai d’investigació per anar a buscar més materials.

BeastSlayer8.title: Matador de bèsties
BeastSlayer8.desc:
NAME va viatjar per diversos planetes, buscant informació d’atacs d’animals. Podia acampar al planeta durant setmanes, aprenent coses de la seva presa abans d’atacar. El que més li agradava era caçar trumbes.
Preferia treballar en soledat, li encantava l’emoció de la cacera i la carn acabada de caçar.

BrothelGofer60.title: Brothel gofer
BrothelGofer60.desc: Born on a steam-powered midworld wracked by a century of economic crises, NAME went to work at a young age. Scrounging, shoe-polishing, sewing - he did it all. But HE was most known as a brothel gofer, delivering all manner of aphrodisiacs and chemicals to the girls' rooms.

DrugLieutenant88.title: Drug lieutenant
DrugLieutenant88.desc:
NAME worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. He had his men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around.
His social skills kept him on top of the political game, and he always had servants to cook and clean.

LaborCampOrphan93.title: Orfenat de camp
LaborCampOrphan93.desc: NAME va perdre els seus pares en un accident industrial i va créixer en un orfenat de camp. Els seus supervisors el feien treballar sense pietat, però almenys li donaven menjar i roba.

UrbworldEnforcer55.title: Vigilant de monciutat
UrbworldEnforcer55.desc:
NAME s’encarregava de fer complir la llei en un monciutat antic.
Es feia amb el pitjor de la humanitat, des de protegir la noblesa avariciosa als seus palaus punxeguts fins a eradicar cultes caníbals amagats en profundes coves sota terra.

GameFanatic49.title: Fanàtic dels jocs
GameFanatic49.desc:
NAME era un jugador fanàtic que sabia com sobreviure als jocs de realitat virtual.
Una vegada , mentre posava a prova les seves habilitats al món real, va ser segrestat per un científic criminal, que va fer alguns experiments sobre ell. Va aconseguir escapar, però no ha pogut oblidar mai aquella experiència.

ToolMechanic40.title: Fabricant d’eines
ToolMechanic40.desc:
NAME va ser un conegut fabricant d’eines en un polsós planeta llunyà.
Després que la seva empresa tanqués per un escàndol, es va unir a una tribu per sobreviure, fabricant ganivets i martells, viatjant i venent les seves eines amb altres assentaments.

ClassClown20.title: Pallasso de la classe
ClassClown20.desc:
Als ambients ultra-competitius de la seva escola de monbrillant, NAME sempre va fer el paper de pallasso per difuminar la tensió.
D’això en va treure una sensació de desesperança social i un gust per la part artística de la comèdia.

CraftShaper11.title: Artesà del torn
CraftShaper11.desc:
NAME es va tancar durant anys al seu estudi i demanava que li portessin menjar per no perdre temps a la cuina.
Les seves creacions van arribar a donar-li el més gran honor del Planeta Semàntic: Permís per utilitzar la tecnologia més avançada per pode materialitzar qualsevol disseny en minuts.

CrimeBossChild12.title: Infant de cap criminal
CrimeBossChild12.desc:
Un important cap criminal va adoptar NAME. Li van ensenyar totes les facetes del negoci familiar, des del contraban fins a enginyoses maneres de matar.
Quan la seva família va ser atacada, el seu pare li va ordenar que s’amagués en una cripta d’hibernació secretat.

MercenaryLeader48.title: Lider mercenari
MercenaryLeader48.desc:
En sortir, NAME va començar a reconstruir l’imperi del seu pare. Va desafiar el líder d’una banda de mercenaris i en va prendre el control, llavors va començar a segrestar naus de càrrega i robar-ne la mercaderia de valor.
Els seus homes es van amotinar. El resultat va ser abandonament, arrest i sentència de mort.

SentimentalChild27.title: criatura sentimental
SentimentalChild27.desc:
NAME feia molta bondat. Quan algçu tenia un problema, provava d’ajudar-lo. Però a la seva edat, no sempre se’n sortia. Això entristia el seu esperit sensible.
Somiava en ser un soldat que lluitava contra alienígenes i bandits.

SpecialForces72.title: Forces especials
SpecialForces72.desc:
Doneu-me una raó per matar – una de bona!
NAME era un soldat ben preparat – tant preparat que va entrar a les forces especials per combatre els milicians i els bandits xenohumans. No era el que es diu un heroi solitari, si no que treballava molt millor en equip.

DustyFarmHand63.title: Treballador de granja
DustyFarmHand63.desc:
Des de que NAME va poder caminar va treballar cuidant els animals i les pastures que la seva família tenia en el seu àrid planeta natal.
Va endurir-se amb el treball, però no li va deixar temps per activitats intel·lectuals.

DromedaryKnight31.title: Cavaller dromedari
DromedaryKnight31.desc:
Havent captat l’atenció del Rei Sorra, NAME va ser entrenat amb la tècnica de lluita del Ratabum Sorrenc.
Sempre amb un camell per transportar coses, va servir lleialment la seva gent de sorra.

HackerKid65.title: Hacker kid
HackerKid65.desc:
Born on a high-tech world, NAME learned hack computers at a young age.
Spending many hours tinkering alone made HIM very good with machines, but very bad with humans.

BattleMechanic79.title: Battle mechanic
BattleMechanic79.desc:
NAME was a tech-obsessed mercenary in an early fusion-era system.
HECAP was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized HIS own equipment with original modifications.

VideoGamer94.title: Video gamer
VideoGamer94.desc:
NAME grew up on a midworld, mostly locked in HIS room, playing video games. HECAP was warm-hearted, with a deep fondness for animals.
As HE grew up, HE turned to drugs to enhance his reality. During these trying times HE found passion and refuge in the gym.

DischargedSoldier81.title: Discharged soldier
DischargedSoldier81.desc:
NAME prostituted himself to fund his drug habits. As an escape, HE joined the military and learned to fight.
Too smart for the army, HE questioned and often disagreed with HIS superiors' decisions. This eventually led to HIS dishonorable discharge and left HIM with a chip on HIS shoulder.

Student1.title: Student
Student1.desc:
NAME studied chemistry and quantum mechanics for entertainment.
HECAP was very good at convincing others to do his physical work, and made it a goal in life to avoid manual labor.

Chemist38.title: Chemist
Chemist38.desc: NAME was a research chemist. HECAP worked with chemicals, from pharmaceuticals to explosives, to develop new substances and treatments.

SuperSoldier19.title: Super soldat
SuperSoldier19.desc:
El govern de NAME va llençar un programa experimenta per la creació de super soldats. Van raptar milers d’infants, els van manipular la ment amb drogues i màquines i els van entrenar per lluitar.
Molts infants van morir, però NAME no. Va matar la primera persona amb sis anys, i l’any següent ja era incorporat en operacions de camp.

SuperSoldier81.title: Super soldat
SuperSoldier81.desc:
Producte d’un programa de super soldats dut a terme per un govern ja destituït, NAME es va perdre. Va sobreviure l’atac suïcida final de la nau nodrissa enemiga. I ara què?
Per primer cop a la vida no tenia ordres per executar ni objectius per acomplir. Es va aixecar d’entre la ferralla i va caminar cap a la incertesa de la llibertat.

HeadjackAddict49.title: Headjack addict
HeadjackAddict49.desc: Plugged in to the computer via head-jack for days at a time, NAME found HE preferred the company of computers to that of people or pets.

CorporateBuilder80.title: Corporate builder
CorporateBuilder80.desc:
Even as HE stewed in HIS own wasted potential, NAME found HE had a knack for moving objects quickly. It was just what the planetary mega-corps wanted in their construction divisions.
Unfortunately, the monotonous work erased HIS remaining creative impulses.

UrbworldArmyBrat71.title: Urbworld army brat
UrbworldArmyBrat71.desc:
NAME grew up on an urbworld military base. HECAP was too young to fight, but HE learned to make HIMself useful in other ways.
HECAP became familiar with guns and military equipment, but never really got in touch with the natural world.

MechanicsEngineer7.title: Mechanics engineer
MechanicsEngineer7.desc:
NAME loved solving problems and, with HIS steady hands and a reputation for quality work, earned a job as a mechanical engineer. HECAP built and redesigned devices of all shapes and sizes.
Eventually, HE was able to pick and choose HIS corporate clients. HECAP made several wealthy friends, as well as a few powerful enemies.

PlagueChild8.title: Plague child
PlagueChild8.desc:
Born on a world wracked by plague, both of NAME's parents were doctors.
NAME was raised in reverse-quarantine, under the Hippocratic oath. HECAP experienced little social interaction. However, HE gained a lot of medical experience assisting in treatments.

PlagueDoctor99.title: Plague doctor
PlagueDoctor99.desc:
NAME provided medical care on multiple plague-wracked worlds, always working under the Hippocratic oath. HECAP improved conditions for those under quarantine while administering complex medical treatments and developing medicines.
HECAP never had time to enjoy a normal life outside of work.

YoungMaster70.title: Young master
YoungMaster70.desc:
Born to two medics, NAME longed for power. HISCAP keen intellect and charisma helped HIM gain the respect of HIS peers.
Deciding that the best way to gain power was to climb the ranks of the imperial military, HE joined at the youngest possible age.

ImperialGeneral31.title: Imperial general
ImperialGeneral31.desc:
NAME's thirst for power defined HIM. HECAP quickly rose through the military ranks and soon attained the rank of general.
HECAP was given with the most challenging task - conquering distant and unexplored rim worlds. Victory here could even position HIM as a successor to the emperor.

CaravanTraveler5.title: Viatger de caravana
CaravanTraveler5.desc: Nascut en una família de marxants nòmades, NAME va aprendre del seu pare l’ofici de comerciant. Sovint li encomanaven de carregar els animals. A causa del seu estil de vida nòmada, caçava i intercanviava mercaderies per menjar.

Caravaneer77.title: Caravanista
Caravaneer77.desc:
NAME era cap d’una caravana. Era responsable de la seguretat de la caravana i va encapçalar innumerables negociacions.
VA prosperar amb la seva gent, però la seva riquesa els feia objectiu dels bergants. Sovint havien de fer servir les armes per fer fora els bandits i saltejadors.

FarmersSon51.title: Fil de granger
FarmersSon51.desc:
NAME va passar la seva infància aprenent bioma de granges. Al seu bioma cuidaven animals per investigar quin s’adaptava millor a l’entorn alienígena.
Degut a això, les restriccions de viatge i el racionament d’oxigen, no va relacionar-se amb ningú de fora de la seva família.

RebelFighter79.title: Lluitador rebel
RebelFighter79.desc:
Quan va esclatar la guerra civil, NAME es va mantenir neutral fines que el seu bioma va ser bombardejat per la milícia lleial.
La seva unitat de combat li van posar el sobrenom «Rar» quan va calar foc al complexe de luxe d’un lider lleial ,amb la gent encara dins.

WealthyStudent21.title: Estudiant ric
WealthyStudent21.desc:
NAME va néixer en un ric monbrillant. Va estudiar a la Universitat d’Enginyeria de Caspia, i va destacar en matemàtiques i programació d’ordinadors.
NAME es va criar en entorns nets i estèrils i no va veure mai cap granja ni cap hort.

Roboticist20.title: Programador de robots
Roboticist20.desc:
NAME se sentia més còmode entre robots i intel·ligències artificials que entre persones orgàniques, així que va posar-se a treballar en robòtica. Es va interessar especialment en mecanites i tecnologia antiga.
NAME confiava les necessitats bàsiques a altres persones.

StreetPeddler62.title: Venedor ambulant
StreetPeddler62.desc:
Crescut en un momitjà industrialitzat on no eren estranys els lladres i els carteristes, NAME ajudava la seva família fent quincalla i bijuteria per vendre al carrer.
Va aprendre de seguida que l’important no era el què sabia, si no a qui coneixia, si volia arribar lluny a la vida.

PrivateDetective57.title: Detectiu privat
PrivateDetective57.desc: Com a vigilant privat, la seva agudesa i la llengua de plata eren les millors eines de NAME. Sovint es passava les nits treballant en casos que anaven des de descobrir assumptes de banyes i secrets comercials fins a resoldre casos d’assassinat i infiltrar-se en organitzacions criminals. No hi havia cap cas que no acceptés si es posaven d’acord en el preu.

BodyguardTrainee27.title: Practicant de guardià
BodyguardTrainee27.desc:
NAME va néixer en una coneguda família de reconeguts guardaespatlles. Les seves mares Elena i Victòria el van posar en moltes situacions perilloses, entrenant-lo per posar la seguretat del seu client per sobre de la pròpia.
Van ensenyar-li infinitat d’herbes i verins naturals per protegir els clients de ser enverinats.

SpaceBartender52.title: Cambrer espacial
SpaceBartender52.desc:
NAME es va convertir en cambrer en una estació espacial. Es va relacionar amb molts estrangers i es va fer amic d’alguns.
Amb el temps, NAME va fer servir el seu coneixement d’herbes per preparar estranys beuratges per als seus clients.

SpoiledChild65.title: Criatura mimada
SpoiledChild65.desc:
El pare de NAME era un esforçat enginyer espacial. Els seus pares li van prohibir la majoria de feines manuals i perilloses, així que va aprendre art i música.
Li encantaven els animals, però els seus pares no li deixaven tenir una mascota, tot i que jugava molt amb les mascotes dels altres.

CosmeticSurgeon52.title: Cirurgià cosmètic
CosmeticSurgeon52.desc:
